page.title: 07OTTERBOURNE CARNIVAL WEEK(2)
page.content: and Fete. The Carnival Procession starts at Coles Mede and finishes at the Waterworks Field. In the procession there is a band, and lots of floats. People dress up,and the Carnival Queen and Princesses ride in a{Horse and {Carriage which belongs to Major {Chamberlayne Macdonald of Cranbury {Park.}There are prizes for the best tableau,the best decorated animal, the best vintage vehicle and several prizes for the best individual children and adults. The best overall entry is awarded the "Cranbury Cup".
